```{r load, include=FALSE}

# set up -----------------------------
library(RPostgreSQL)
library(dplyr)
library(highcharter)
library(purrr) # facet charts
library(htmltools)

#connect to postgres
source("W:\\RDA Team\\R\\credentials_source.R")
con <- connect_to_db("eci_fresno_ripa")

# pull analysis table for visualizing
traffic_reason_race <- dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM report_traffic_reason_race")

dbDisconnect(con)
```

```{r prep-data, include=FALSE}
df <- traffic_reason_race %>%
  filter(race!="nh_sswana") %>% # don't need this will use sswana_aoic which is the same
  mutate(race_label = 
           case_when(
             race == 'latinx' ~ "Latinx",
             race =='nh_white' ~ 'White',
             race =='nh_black' ~ 'Black',
             race == 'nh_asian' ~ 'Asian',
             race == 'nh_multiracial' ~ 'Multiracial',
             race == 'aian_aoic' ~ 'AIAN',
             race == 'nh_aian' ~ 'AIAN NH',
             race == 'nhpi_aoic' ~ 'NHPI',
             race == 'nh_nhpi' ~ 'NHPI NH',
             race == 'sswana_aoic' ~ 'SWANA/SA',
             .default = as.character(race)),
         statute_literal_25 = 
           case_when(
             statute_literal_25 == 'UNSAFE SPEED:PREVAIL COND' ~ "Unsafe Speed while Driving Vehicle",
             statute_literal_25 =='NO REG:VEH/TRAILER/ETC' ~ 'No Vehicle Registration',
             statute_literal_25 =='OPR VEH:WINDOW OBSTRUCTED' ~ 'Obstructed Window',
             statute_literal_25 == 'FAIL STOP LINE/ETC AT RED' ~ 'Failure to Stop at Red Light',
             .default = as.character(statute_literal_25)))


# split separate dfs for each denominator option-----
df_race <- df %>%
  filter(denom=="traffic_stop_race" & count >= 10) # I think this denominator is the best one for visualizing

# Combine the two 'using cell phone with no handheld device' citations into one -----
summed <- df_race %>%
  select(race, denom, statute_literal_25, total, count, race_label) %>%
  filter(statute_literal_25 %in% c("USE CELLPH W/DRIV W/O HFD", "NO HND HLD DEVICE W/DRIVE")) %>%
  group_by(race, denom) %>%
  summarise(statute_literal_25= "Use of Cellphone with No Handheld Device",
            total=total,
            count = sum(count),
            rate=count/total*100,
            race_label=race_label) %>%
  slice(1) %>%
  ungroup()

# Append these summed rows to the original data frame
df_combined <- rbind(df_race, summed)

# rearrange df and remove the previous separate cell phone citations

df_combined <- df_combined %>%
  filter(grepl("Unsafe Speed while Driving Vehicle|Obstructed Window|No Vehicle Registration", statute_literal_25)) %>%
  arrange(race, -rate)

```

```{r prep-visual, include=FALSE}
# create caption 
sourcenote <- "Catalyst California calculations based on City of Fresno's Police Stop Data (2022), catalystcalifornia.org, 2024."

methodnote <- "Analysis for all officer-initiated traffic stops made by officers in 2022. Less than 10 people Fresno PD perceived as NHPI or AIAN were stopped in an officer-initiated traffic stop in 2022. For data masking purposes the data for these groups is suppressed from this chart."

racenote <- "Race/ethnicity: SWANA/SA=Southwest Asian (Middle Eastern) or North African, or South Asian."

caption_text <- paste("<br>", racenote, sourcenote, methodnote)

# create tooltip text
tooltip_text <- "Out of all the people Fresno PD stopped in traffic and perceived as <b>{point.race_label}</b>, <b>{point.rate:.1f}%</b> of those people were stopped for the reason of <b>{point.statute_literal_25}</b>, or a total of <b>{point.count:.1f}</b> people."

```

```{r create-visual, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Facet charts
list_of_plots <- map(unique(df_combined$statute_literal_25), function(x) {
  filtered_data <- df_combined %>%
    filter(statute_literal_25 == x) %>%
    arrange(desc(rate))  # Sort by descending y-values
  
  if (nrow(filtered_data) == 0) {
    return(NULL)  # Skip this group if there are no rows
  }

   hchart(filtered_data, "bar", hcaes(x = race_label, y = rate),
           showInLegend = FALSE, color = "#3A207D") %>% 
    hc_plotOptions(column = list(stacking = "normal")) %>% 
    hc_add_theme(hc_theme_smpl()) %>% 
    hc_title(text = paste0("Rate of Traffic Stops by Reason: ", x)) %>% 
    hc_yAxis(title = list(text = ""))%>%
    hc_xAxis(title = list(text = ""))%>%
    hc_caption(
      text = caption_text,
      useHTML=TRUE)%>%
   hc_tooltip(pointFormat = tooltip_text)
})

  
browsable(
  tagList(
    tags$h3("Fresno PD Pulls Over People Perceived as BIPOC in Traffic Stops for Reasons Not Related to Safety at Higher Rates than People Perceived as White"), # Main title
    list_of_plots %>% hw_grid(rowheight = 350)       # Faceted charts
  )
)
```
